author: Thecrump
post_text: January 9, 2018 at 5:37â€¯AM#1Hello,I am trying to create a macro that will allow the user to make sure that particular a storing preset type is selected.Such as having a macro to select when you want to be in "selective", "global", or "universal" mode.I have seen a few syntax'sex.Root "Userprofiles".$"USERPROFILE"."StoreDefaults"."PresetDefaults" /MODE=PRESET TYPE DEFAULTRoot PresetType /defaultscope=selectiveAny advice or information would be amazing!all the best.-Jenn
title: Creating a macro to help select presets types
